name: Save the Fly
short_description:
Smash the spiders and keep a fly alive. Every smash gives you points, cut the spider thread and smash spider while it's falling, and get twice more points. At this moment in a game you will find 4 different types of spiders and 1 type of frog.

-- Gameplay --
Touch black spider to smash and get 10 points.
Touch green spider twice to smash and get 20 points.
Touch violet spider when it has reached stone to smash and get 30 points.
Tilt phone to left or right to avoid frog’s tongue.
Strip thread with your finger then smash spider while it is falling and get 2x more points (works only with black and green spiders).
Do Last Second Smash by smashing spider when it's near fly and get 50 points.
To smash black widow:
1. Keep smashing it till life reaches 1.
2. Do Last Second Smash.

Published by: http://piratewap.net/download/local/files/mobile/HWZXn5Rqce/Save-the-Fly-Free-apk
Supported by: http://mp3hits.me/
summary: Smash the spiders and keep a fly alive.
